class.name: SpineConstraintData
class.brief_description: The base class for all constraint datas.
class.description: The base class for all constraint datas.

method.name: get_constraint_name
method.description: The constraint's name, which is unique across all constraints in the skeleton of the same type.

method.name: get_order
method.description: The ordinal of this constraint for the order a skeleton's constraints will be applied by [code]Skeleton.update_world_transform[/code].

method.name: is_skin_required
method.description: When true, [code]Skeleton.update_world_transform[/code] only updates this constraint if the active skin contains this constraint.
